channel.title: Preschool on aggregated thinking
channel.description: Recent content in Preschool on aggregated thinking

item.title: Covered area expansion project
item.description: We’ve recently decided to cover the whole area where the outdoor canteen was and turn into an activity area. I was supposed to have completed the electrical wiring last Saturday but the materials were delivered at noon and I was already quite content with just spending the afternoon with the kids.[nggallery id=5]Will post more pictures this week as we try and finish the fascia, flooring, and electrical works.

item.title: Tarp sign got installed this am, just before parents' orientation. #hci
